com.flamingOctoIronman.subsystem.HID

Class HIDManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flamingOctoIronman.framework.manager.Manager
      • com.flamingOctoIronman.core.manager.CoreManager
        • com.flamingOctoIronman.subsystem.HID.HIDManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class HIDManager
extends CoreManager
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
    This class manages all input and output systems for the game.
    Author:
    Quint Heinecke
